text: Hi Everyone, I'm building a custom card, and I have a test version working, but I initially created it to display in "contacts > contacts", the use case shifted, and now it needs to be displayed in 'sales > deals'. I've search and found references to changing location from tab to the sidebar, but not to the deals section. I attempted to just change the objectTypes field from 'contacts' to 'deals'. but when I do I get an error stating the json doesn't match the associated scheme, and to add the fetch and subsequent attributes.
If anyone can point me in the right direction to documentation that outlines this functionality, I'd very much appreciate it.
